ingredients: 4 medium apples - peeled, cored and sliced,   +   1/2  pomegranate, skin and light-colored membrane removed,   +   1/2 cup brown sugar, 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg,   +   1/2 cup rolled oats,   +   1/2 cup all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted
nutrition: Total Fat 12g 16%, Saturated Fat 7g 37%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 7mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 47g 17%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 35g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 4mg 19%, Calcium 32mg 2%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 152mg 3%
